description: This file defines a UI page component named 'Home' for a food delivery frontend. It renders a list of restaurant cards, fetches restaurant data from an API upon creation, and handles user input to navigate to a specific restaurant.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A Blits component representing the home page of the food delivery application, displaying a list of restaurants with their details.

methods.name: created
methods.description: An asynchronous lifecycle method that fetches the list of restaurants from the API when the component is created.

methods.name: enter
methods.description: Handles the input event 'enter' to navigate to the first restaurant's detail page if available.
